label.h3: To be displayed in the section form, a data element:

choicegroup.choice: Needs to be assigned to the data set, but not to a section
Needs to be first assigned to the data set then assigned to a section of the data set
Can be assigned to several sections of a same data set
Can be assigned to a section of the data set directly from the list of the data elements available in the DHIS2 system

div.p: A data element can only be assigned to one section within the data entry form to prevent double entries and needs to be pre-assigned to the data set.
